techmeme.title: Coinbase says its new "everything exchange" will include tokenized assets, stocks, derivatives, prediction markets, and more, for US users in the coming months (Tanaya Macheel/CNBC)
Amazon reports Q2 AWS revenue up 17.5% YoY to $30.9B, vs. $30.8B est., and AWS operating income up 8.8% YoY to $10.2B (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
Reddit reports Q2 revenue up 78% YoY to $500M, vs. $426M est., daily active uniques up 21% to 110.4M, Q3 guidance above est.; RDDT jumps 10%+ after hours (Angela Palumbo/Barron's Online)
Amazon reports Q2 ad revenue up 23% YoY to $15.7B, vs. $14.9B est., and subscription services revenue up 12% YoY to $12.2B (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
